name: CQ.themes.wcm.ContentFinderTab

props.name: DDPROXY_HEIGHT
props.doc:
<static> The height of thumbnails inside the Drag and Drop Proxy
(defaults to 100).

props.name: DDPROXY_PADDING_LEFT
props.doc: <static> The left padding of the Drag and Drop Proxy (defaults to 20).

props.name: DDPROXY_PADDING_TOP
props.doc:
<static> The top padding of the Drag and Drop Proxy
(defaults to 3).

props.name: DDPROXY_WIDTH
props.doc:
<static> The width of thumbnails inside the Drag and Drop Proxy
(defaults to 140).

props.doc: <static> The default anchor width for form fields of Query Boxes (defaults to "100%").

props.name: QUERYBOX_HEIGHT
